title: S6 Ranked placements.
body: Just a quick overview and perhaps a bit of a warning. From what I have seen so far, I would have been better off waiting until all the kids finished their placements. Because as it stands, I have had two players come into a game and say they got dropped a division and don't care about how they go over the course of the next few games. In a small way, it's a kind of, "fuck you" to those who are actually trying to get a decent placement. I understand that I sound salty, and by all means I am. But just a heads up for those of you who are thinking of getting ranked, just wait a week or two, it will do you wonders.

replies.body:
Pretty much. Then theres the players who avoided ranked over preseaon so their mmr wouldn't drop, completely out of practice. Playing arams for 2 months doesnt keep you up to par...

I'll just keep spamming ranked, its a good laugh to say the least.
Haha yea. Well now that I'm placed, only Gold 2, but it's not horrible, I don't have to stress so much over people fucking me over in placements.
I think i am gonna wait

I want to know how can this be, i was gold 5 i did my placements didnÂ´t go that well i did 5/5 and i get placed in bronze.. i finish the season with at least 20 more wins than loses i dont understand this system i lose 500 elo and i dont even lose more then wath i win i realy dont understand and this make me sad..
How about this: s3 -> placement 9-1 -> bronze1? Can someone explain it to me?
